articles.title: Scientists may have found 'trigger' behind extremely rare blood clots after AstraZeneca vaccine - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Concern over the AstraZeneca vaccine led some countries across Europe, including Ireland, offering alternative Covid-19 vaccines to those aged under 40
articles.content:
Scientists say they may have found what they believe to be "the trigger" of extremely rare blood clots after the AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine.
